sub_title: Associate Professor with the International Relations Department of Kyiv International University – Kyiv International University
summary:
Kyiv International University from 2017 until 2023
Associate Professor with the International Relations Department of Kyiv International University, Ukraine. Candidate of Political Science (2017). Author of 45 publications, four monographs, three textbooks
“Vulver Ltd.” from 2012 until 2017
at this company, I was head of foreign economic relations. My works included daily communication with our business partners from Italy (DAB), Germany (Erhard, Hubert, Trojan Technologies Germany), Switzerland (SULZER), Belgium (BELVEN), USA (Jet). I prepared all legal letters and contracts, documents for visas, took part in business negotiations in EU countries and America, attended exhibitions together with the top management, organized and guided Ukrainian delegations to European factories, communicated with diplomatic staff and Ukrainian authorities
“Kostopil food factory Ltd.” from December 2009 until September 2010
a food production company where I supported and assisted the (technical) management during installation of foreign bought equipment. I was also their legal advisor to resolve issues with these foreign companies during and after the works.
“Swisspan by Sorbess” from 2007 until 2009
at this company, I was company a lawyer too for all sorts of international and national contracts with our customers. I was directly attached to the top management consisting of three directors and prepared all their legal letters and contracts. These contracts and related paperwork were either in Ukrainian, Russian, English or German.
“Kwasuliv Ltd., producer of communal equipment” from 2004 until 2006
At this company with around 300 employees, I started as a company lawyer and I prepared contracts and other documents for banks, tax bureau, court and other institutions. During the course of my employment, I was promoted to Human Resources Director.

education.field_of_study: Political Problems of International Systems and Global Development

school.name: University of law in “Ostrog Academy” from 1998 until 2004 and diploma in 2004

profile_positions.description:
On 04.05.2017 was defended at Diplomatic Academy of Ukraine a thesis on specialty Political Problems of International Systems and Global Development and received a degree Candidate of Political Sciences based on the Attestation board decision of 26 of June 2017. 
Since September 2017 Associate Professor with the International Relations Department of Kyiv International University, Ukraine. Author of 40 publications, three monographs, 2 textbooks. 
Research interests: international relations, regional processes and security issues in Southeast Asia, Russian-Ukrainian relations.
